replies.body: I don't see any records of issues with the game platform service. Where are you encountering issues with the client?

> [{quoted}](name=Targons Blade,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=PKMAhZna,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-10-12T02:26:08.850+0000)
>
> I don't see any records of issues with the game platform service. Where are you encountering issues with the client?

sorry just 5 minutes later after the post, the client went back up for me.

 I guess I over reacted the situation because this is my first time I had that issue, I have rly good internet connection/network connection (whatever u wanna call it). 

I was in champ select and it booted me off and I check browsers and it worked fine it was just the client not working for me.


ty for responding though
